Posts.Content: What a heartwarming story.Wonderful to see your great support. Tommaseena prayers are with you. It shows that you are a great fighter. Hugs Chetra
Posts.Title: Son supported MOM today

Posts.Content: I was on tamoxifen from Feb 2008 to March 2009. I was dx with the cancer returning to the bone in my spine. So my hormone theropy has went to a shot once a month will get the name at nexted visit. But I had no side effects from tamoxifen other than weight gain. I had a complete After my mastectomy I had a historectomy ( spelled wrong Im sure) so was already dealing with hot flashes ect...But they all subsided pretty much. Fatigue is the hardest. Hope I have helped soom. Hugs - Hang Strong Chetra
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen..How did everyone do on it??
